synopsis.text:
Together with his feathered companion, Shila, a young boy named Sindbad embarks on a thrilling journey beyond the bustling city of Baghdad. Growing up in the ancient metropolis filled with bazaars and aspiring merchants, Sindbad's life takes a turn when his uncle, Captain Ali, regales him with fantastical tales of his travels. Inspired by these stories and driven by his insatiable curiosity, Sindbad decides to defy his parents' wishes and stow away on his uncle's ship.

As they set sail, Sindbad and the talking bird, Shila, encounter numerous dangers and uncover hidden secrets. The wide world beyond Baghdad offers Sindbad the opportunity to experience fun, action, and adventure. With his newfound knowledge and experiences, little Sindbad grows from a mischievous boy into a daring explorer, eager to uncover the mysteries that lie beyond the horizon.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
